ygData.subject: Re: A little off topic but...
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually all the two-word silly lastnames are overused, if you can, try and think up a real dwarvish lastname.. - Avron Elselynn - High elven Paladin on
ygData.messageBody:
Actually all the two-word silly lastnames are overused, if you can, try and
think up a real dwarvish lastname..

- Avron Elselynn - High elven Paladin on Solusek Ro


Vey Takon wrote:

> From: Vey Takon <veytakon@...>
>
> Iron has been overused. I would stick with the Runeblade.
>
